original_text: But now you do not seem to be happy with me any more. I can say that you would have pulled out your own eyes to help me. You would have given them to me, if that had been possible.
korean_text: 너희의 복이 지금 어디 있느냐 내가 너희에게 증언하노니 너희가 할 수만 있었더라면 너희의 눈이라도 빼어 나에게 주었으리라

sentences.original_text: But now you do not seem to be happy with me any more.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 당신은 더 이상 나에게 만족하지 않는 것 같습니다.

sentences.original_text: you would have pulled out your own eyes to help me.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 나를 돕기 위해 자신의 눈을 뽑아내었을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: You would have given them to me,
